### Contract Award

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for the supply of one Aerosol Magee Scientific DRI-2015 (SERIES 2) Multi-wavelength Carbon Analyzer, or equivalent, for the analysis of atmospheric carbon and its impact on global warming. The instrument must separately determine elemental carbon (EC) and pyrolytic carbon (PC) during analysis of quartz filters to accurately separate the EC contained in the sample and the PC generated during the analysis. The analyzer must also estimate the amount of brown carbon (BrC) on the sample filters to address the constraining of the separation between OC and EC in samples loaded with biomass smoke, containing water-soluble and light absorbing organic compounds.
